documents.document: @Sinceritas_C Oh, what a pity. Still, there are plenty of other choices.
@Sinceritas_C I've just remembered the MM complete Poulenc song set of CDs but I don't know if you can buy them as a box set yet.
@Sinceritas_C The Johnson complete Schumann lieder box set? Maybe a Weill box set? (don't know if there is one, though).
@vicwray Oh, that sounds hard 😔 Good coping skills, though, V 👍 Take care xx
@OrchestraWLG I'm glad 😊 Music matters a great deal to me.
@Sinceritas_C Relevant to your interests...https://t.co/eC7GivFpvB
@corrinacellist And here, this morning. Time for the close fitting clothes.
Oh goody. We haven't had one of these for a few days and I was starting to get worried https://t.co/XH43z1pbv5
@corrinacellist I shall await your report with interest.
@corrinacellist Perhaps his phobia only extends to going down stairs?
@shandyland There's comfort to be had in everyday small enjoyments, to be sure.
@shandyland Thanks for this. You are right, of course. I'm just finding it a bit weird to talk about normal things on twitter atm.
Also, this is most enjoyable. https://t.co/c7aQ8PbDkK
I know there are many more important things happening in the world right now but I am happy that my @OrchestraWLG tickets arrived today.
@Sinceritas_C My pleasure 😊
@ivisbohlen It is a lovely photo. You look so happy, Ivis 😊 @KayTawney
@Sinceritas_C I think I must've been slightly too old to be interested in the Smurfs. I remember my sisters were, though.
I don't understand either Linkis's purpose or its business model. Please could someone enlighten me?
@Sinceritas_C Awful, isn't it? Makes me feel better about being a mean mum and not letting my children watch rubbish TV progs like that.
@Sinceritas_C I recognise bits & pieces from fairy tales plus misogyny; but I get the sense you see something more specific?
@iamths1973 Yay. That sounds perfect for you two 👬Good luck with the packing!
@iamths1973 I can imagine! 🙈 Will you have more room at your new house?
@iamths1973 Are you moving, Till? Or just putting some things into storage?
@Sinceritas_C 😄 Being a child's watch, though, I thought the wrist strap might be too small. Nope 👍
@Sinceritas_C It even fits really well 😊
@_ShyamBhatt Their Instagram account OMG
@_ShyamBhatt Whereas if you were here, you'd have options like this https://t.co/IFokANDSCZ
When your children think something is now too childish for them to wear, so you score the Lego watch #winning https://t.co/JSgqHWgjGc
@shandyland It would be in mine, too. Ditto for parcels with the name of classical music suppliers on the outside. #worksforme
@Adrian_Specs That's grand news 😊 @Sinceritas_C @CrossEyedPiano @baroquebird
@JuhaIivarinen Sounds like a very busy trip! I'm glad you finally got some time outside while it was still light.
@Adrian_Specs I'll see your rooftop and raise you one mountain. #whatisitwithpianistsandheights? https://t.co/CZr6axNXJs
@JuhaIivarinen It's a beautiful city, isn't it? I'd love to go there one day. Are you there on holiday or for work, Juha?
@LietoFineLondon Awww. Happy Anniversary! 💐
@Sinceritas_C Thank you - yes, it is 👍 @marik140407
@Sinceritas_C Faster tempi than I was expecting. I need to spend time listening all the way through rather than just to the mezzo bits 😄
@Sinceritas_C It pretty much pushes all my musical buttons at once - the piece; that cast; that conductor #bingo! Thank you so much.
@irishpianoman So it is - about 4 minutes in 😂
@irishpianoman No, but I like it very much. I'm a Biber fan, though, so I would say that 😄
@Sinceritas_C I really enjoyed the choir, too, especially the beautifully clear diction.
@Sinceritas_C So good! I really enjoyed Dorothee Mields's performance, too. Their voices fit well together, I think.
@irishpianoman Have you heard Biber's Musketeer's March? https://t.co/e5Y0pbN7FD
@Sinceritas_C Me neither but that cantata is really worth a listen.
@Sinceritas_C I noticed the date 😊 Earlier tonight I tweeted a link to GR & Dorothee Mields et al performing a WF Bach cantata. So lovely.
@Sinceritas_C Ahahahahahahahahaha. She is fabulous, though. I'll definitely seek out her performances/recordings now.
How have I missed hearing Gerhild Romberger until now?!
@Sinceritas_C Thanks, C! You spoil me xx @LiederabendCat
@SCaseyNZ Haha. Just do whatever seems fun to you, I say.
@Sinceritas_C Thank you 😊 Something fun for me to do tonight after work 🤗 @LiederabendCat
@LiederabendCat @Sinceritas_C I don't think I know any Satie songs. I think I'll have to rectify that!!
@Sinceritas_C Ha! I didn't think of that but you are right, nepotism and all 😶@LiederabendCat
@SCaseyNZ But that actually sounds really good to me (depending on the kind of music, I guess).
@Sinceritas_C Yes 👍 And let us not forget Beethoven's Flohlied... @LiederabendCat
Like this one for Tarte Tartin https://t.co/AlBbWBySVG #ttrttpt
Coping with world craziness by watching beautifully shot videos with no soundtracks/voiceovers on the Peaceful Cuisine YT channel. Ahhhh.
@Adrian_Specs Great seats!
Some nice insights about performing Wagner from Stuart Skelton in this interview https://t.co/9n0Gz6gxSa
@hissingswan Have a wonderful time! Glad to hear you've made Special Occasion cuisine 😋
@baroquebird Yes indeed. T sauce a must 👍
@baroquebird I hear you. Love a good banger.
@baroquebird You can never go wrong with a good cocktail sausage #lifetruths
@baroquebird Mmm. They do sound good. If they were joined together, perhaps they could be a twist of cocktail sausages? Or a feast?
@baroquebird I'm going to say "party" since that's also the natural habitat for cocktail sausages (AKA cheerios) #yum
@vicwray Yes. Yes, we do.
@vicwray Been meaning to say for ages how much I appreciate what you share here. You find some great stuff!
@vicwray Thanks for the share, V. A lot of head nodding as I read it! @RachelProsser @nardwebster @SusanCarchedi
@ivisbohlen Some things are best left as mysteries, aren't they? 😄
@simon_j_holden Understand completely. My wish list is always many times more extensive than I can afford 💸💸💸
@simon_j_holden I'd been looking out for it and pounced once it was released. Wanna borrow it?
The perfect accompaniment to today's wild weather. https://t.co/BYXIWOfWNu
@KalliJari Me neither - not for about 30-mumble years! 😳
@sarabeee I bet they have more flavour than a whole punnet of bought ones, though.
This is a good album to be listening to when you're chopping onions. You're crying anyway, so. https://t.co/lDYhyK9nYy
@iamths1973 Listening now to a Ralph Kirkpatrick GV album (Archiv Produktion) on YouTube. It's good!
@iamths1973 I've not heard that one. Perhaps my library will have it. Pierre Hantaï's & Andreas Staier's GVs are also fab. @jsdhenderson
Happy memories of singing this at secondary school with the chamber choir: Josquin des Prez's "El grillo" https://t.co/wzLVAEjsCQ
@shandyland Excellent choice! Another *really* good album.
@jsdhenderson Just realised my ME tweet might have seemed completely random! It was in reply to your question re Goldberg variation recs.
@shandyland Honestly, I can't think of a ME album I haven't loved - interesting programming and expressive performances. I'm quite a fan 😍
@shandyland Yes - late last year.
@boulezian Or Bach, always consoling.
@MiramarMike Oh. That's clear, then 😉
A course of study really quite relevant to my interests https://t.co/eiiaI828br
@MiramarMike Aww, thanks *blush*
@MiramarMike 👏🏻 I enjoyed reading this very much. I may have gone a bit gooey inside.
@Sinceritas_C Thanks, C. Me, too. It was pretty wild and crazy outside last night.
@HorowhenuaNZ Maybe we'll have another really late summer (in autumn) like we did last year? I wouldn't object.
@HorowhenuaNZ That's amazing. Did you get enough water to fill the tanks and give the feijoas a good drink?
@ElizabethKnoxNZ Yeah. Apparently this weather will ease by mid morning. You might be able to get some rest soon.
@ElizabethKnoxNZ Perhaps he might be interested in the beneficial acoustic properties of storm shutters? 😉(I have no idea if they have any)
@irishpianoman 😄 Thanks!
This morning's view from the train #whereisWellington? https://t.co/3wJCMamRS2
@JuhaIivarinen Thanks, Juha xx Apparently the weather conditions will begin to improve mid morning, so there's not long to wait.
@Adrian_Specs Thanks, A xx
@irishpianoman You'd feel right at home here, no doubt! 😂
@ElizabethKnoxNZ Absolutely, especially since weather extremes will soon become commonplace.
@ElizabethKnoxNZ 😩 Good practical response, though 👍
This may seem unexceptional but we've had some fairly extreme bad wind and rain overnight #ttrttpt
Woke up today to find that the house is still all in one piece, we've lost no trees and the trains are running. Today is going well so far.
@tinydooms Wishing you and your family all the best, Christie xx
